data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Internacional get the game underway.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Thiago Duarte Peixoto.
In the minute 2, Thiago Duarte Peixoto awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Internacional's Andres D'Alessandro is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Internacional push forward at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos and Edenilson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Botafogo defence.
In the minute 5, Internacional to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Thiago Galhardo scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 6, Moises with an assist there.
Throw-in Botafogo.
Can Botafogo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Internacional's half?
In the minute 10, Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Botafogo.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Botafogo have a dangerous throw-in.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Thiago Duarte Peixoto.
In the minute 15, Botafogo are pushing forward but Matheus Babi's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 17, Thiago Duarte Peixoto awards the home team a throw-in.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Free kick Internacional.
In the minute 22, In Rio de Janeiro Internacional attack through Gabriel Boschilia. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Guilherme Santos of Botafogo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Thiago Duarte Peixoto.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Gabriel Boschilia puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Great play from Thiago Galhardo to set up the goal.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Botafogo.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Botafogo's Caio Alexandre has been booked in Rio de Janeiro and will miss the next match through suspension.
Free kick Botafogo.
In the minute 34, Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a Internacional throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
Botafogo needs to be cautious. Internacional have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 35, Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 36, Andres D'Alessandro (Internacional) has received a first yellow card.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional drive forward but Thiago Galhardo is judged offside.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Botafogo's Pedro Raul is whistled for offside at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a throw-in for Botafogo, close to Internacional's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Rio de Janeiro.
The first-half is over at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 46, Botafogo have kicked-off the second half at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Botafogo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Thiago Duarte Peixoto blows against Internacional's Andres D'Alessandro for offside.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Gabriel Boschilia is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 56, Pedro Raul (Botafogo) gets a yellow card.
Gabriel Boschilia for Internacional is back on the field again.
Free kick Botafogo.
In the minute 58, Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Luiz Otavio is replacing Rafael Forster for the home team.
Bruno Nazario is on a sub for Caio Alexandre for Botafogo.
In the minute 59, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 65, Matheus Babi is booked for the home team.
Throw-in Botafogo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, The away team replace Andres D'Alessandro with Damian Musto.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Botafogo's Danilo Barcelos misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In Rio de Janeiro Botafogo's Pedro Raul is caught offside.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 70, Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulo Autuori (Botafogo) is making a third substitution, with Cicero replacing Rhuan.
In the minute 72, Botafogo are coming forward and Bruno Nazario gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto awards Internacional a goal kick.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a Internacional throw-in in Botafogo's half.
In the minute 80, Internacional make their second substitution with Marcos Guilherme replacing Patrick.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto awards the home team a throw-in.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Thiago Duarte Peixoto.
In the minute 85, Thiago Duarte Peixoto waits before resuming play because Ze Gabriel for Internacional is still down.
Rodrigo Moledo (Internacional) has replaced the possibly injured Ze Gabriel.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Internacional.
The home team replace Pedro Raul with Davi Araujo.
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 89, Marcos Guilherme of Internacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Internacional have a goal kick.
Thiago Duarte Peixoto signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
That's full-time at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. The final score is 0-2.
